item.title: CVE-2011-1028|2024-08-06T22:14:27.221Z -- smarty3 -- smarty3
item.description: The $smarty.template variable in Smarty3 allows attackers to possibly execute arbitrary PHP code via the sysplugins/smarty_internal_compile_private_special_variable.php file.
